title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example displays excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. This bug report aims to address this issue.
OB: When the Control Example is run and the window is resized vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames within the example flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be no excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue in the Control Example: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames within the example flash.
